si.title: මොණරගල 5 කට 5 ක් සඳහා
body_lines: මොණරගල දිස්ත්රික්කයේ ජාතික මහජන බලය ආසන පහක් හා එක්සත් ජනතා බලය දිනා ගෙන තිබේ.

en.title: 5 for 5 in Moneragala
body_lines: In the Moneragala district, the National People's Power has won five seats and the United People's Power.

summary_lines: Here's a summary of the text in approximately 200 characters:
National People's Power wins 5 seats in Moneragala district. United People's Power also secures victories.
